We Real Cool: Black Men and Masculinity bụ akwụkwọ edere na afo Puku abuo na ano banyere nwoke site n'aka onye edemede ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ na-achịkọta edemede iri banyere ndị isi ojii
Aha ya na-ezo aka n'abụ Gwendolyn Brooks nke 1959 "We Real Cool"
Ebumnuche nke edemede ndị ahụ bụ inye nkatọ ọdịbendị na ngwọta maka nsogbu ọ chọpụtara.
